video_prompt: Hands cradle a swirling, brightening galaxy. A comet streaks across the cosmic background towards the galaxy, which expands its glowing arms. Distant galaxies subtly appear and disappear, emphasizing vastness. Subtle hand movements suggest nurturing or presenting the cosmic object.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Two cupped human hands holding a glowing spiral galaxy against a dark, star-filled cosmic background. A luminous streaking comet with an orange head and blue tail arcs towards the galaxy. Faint spiral galaxies in the distant background. Dramatic lighting. Cosmic, awe-inspiring.
refined_video_prompt: Hands cradle a galaxy as it swirls and brightens. A comet streaks across the cosmic background, approaching the galaxy whose glowing arms expand. Distant galaxies subtly appear and disappear. The hands subtly shift, nurturing or presenting the cosmic object.
